column2: 一個（用於單數可數名詞前）
column4: She has a cat and an apple.
column5: 她有一隻貓和一顆蘋果。

column4: He is able to swim very fast.
The picture hangs above the bed.
According to the news, it will rain tomorrow.
You must act quickly in an emergency.
column5: 緊急狀況下你必須迅速行動。

column4: His brave action saved the child.
column5: 他的英勇行動救了那個孩子。

column4: The actor won an award for his performance.
column5: 那位男演員因他的表演獲獎。

column4: Please add some sugar to my coffee.
column5: 請在我的咖啡裡加些糖。
